acceptTerms: I accept the use of my personal data in the context of this competition
athleteAlreadyInscribedNotByYou: This athlete is already registered for this competition by another user. In case of doubt, please contact the organizer.

success.title: Your registration has been successfully saved
success.message: An email has been sent to you with the details of your inscription.

pending.title: Your registration is being processed
pending.message: An email will be sent to you as soon as your registration is validated.

needToBeConnected: You need to be connected to register for a competition
needToBeVerified: You need to verify your account to register for a competition
noEvent: This competition has no event yet
clubNotAllowed: Your club is not allowed to register for this competition
